definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: The yield difference between ravine rainforest and secondary forest was not significant.
sentences.chinese: 沟谷雨林和次生林下阳春砂仁果实产量差异不显著。

sentences.english: What regeneration of harvested slash of secondary forest formed artificial plantation performs non-stable.
sentences.chinese: 次生林采伐迹地更新所形成的人工林表现出不稳定性。

sentences.english: The newly emerged forest is called secondary forest.
sentences.chinese: 第二次长出来的森林就是次生林。

sentences.english: A secondary forest is a natural forest formed after the original forest was felled.
sentences.chinese: 次生林就是经过砍伐后又长起来的天然林。

sentences.english: It's the most well preserved river valley second growth forest in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 它是亚洲保存最完整的河谷次生林。

sentences.english: Part of the area which is not under cultivation may have the appearance of a secondary forest.
sentences.chinese: 林地中尚未耕作的部分看上去如同次生林。

definition: old growth forest/primary forest/original forest cover
Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
